title: Krusteaz Blueberry Pancakes
preparation: Heat pancake griddle to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (medium heat).
Stir pancake mix and water (use Warm water and not cold) together with a wire whisk. Batter will be slightly lumpy. (Do not overmix.) Let batter stand 2 minutes.
Pour slightly less than 1/4 cup of batter per pancake onto the griddle.
Cooke pancakes 1 minute to 1 minute and 15 seconds per side, or until golden brown, turning only once.
